    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 0.25, 0, 0, 0
    def c6, -1, 0.5, 1.5, -0
    def c19, -0.999000013, 0.5, 2.5, 1.5
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_EC049E6E_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

texldl r8, c220.z, s15
mov r9.xyw, v0
add r8.w, r9.w, -r8.y
mad r9.x, r8.w, r8.x, r9.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r9.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r9.x
      mov r1.yz, r9.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r9.xyww, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r9.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.y, r9.xxyw
    mul r0.yz, r0.x, r0
    mul r1, r0.z, c12

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_EC049E6E_0.txt
add r8.w, r0.x, -r8.y
mad r0.y, -r8.w, r8.x, r0.y

    mad r1, c11, r0.y, r1
    mad r1, c13, r0.x, r1
    add r1, r1, c14
    rcp r0.w, r1.w
    mul r1.xy, r0.w, r1
    mul r2.xy, r1, c17
    frc r2.xy, r2
    mov r3.x, c6.x
    mad r1.xy, r1, c17, r3.x
    add r1.xy, -r2, r1
    add r4, r1.xyxy, c6.yyyz
    mul r4, r4, c18.xyxy
    mul r5, r4.xyxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r5, r5, s2
    max r0.w, c19.x, -r1.z
    add r1.z, r0.w, r5.x
    mad_sat r5.x, r1.z, c17.z, -r3.x
    mul r4, r4.zwxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r4, r4, s2
    add r1.z, r0.w, r4.x
    mad_sat r5.y, r1.z, c17.z, -r3.x
    add r4, r1.xyxy, c19.yzwy
    mul r4, r4, c18.xyxy
    mul r6, r4.xyxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r6, r6, s2
    add r1.z, r0.w, r6.x
    mad_sat r5.z, r1.z, c17.z, -r3.x
    mul r4, r4.zwxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r4, r4, s2
    add r1.z, r0.w, r4.x
    mad_sat r4.x, r1.z, c17.z, -r3.x
    add r6, r1.xyxy, c19.wwwz
    mul r6, r6, c18.xyxy
    mul r7, r6.xyxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r7, r7, s2
    add r1.z, r0.w, r7.x
    mad_sat r4.y, r1.z, c17.z, -r3.x
    mul r6, r6.zwxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r6, r6, s2
    add r1.z, r0.w, r6.x
    mad_sat r4.z, r1.z, c17.z, -r3.x
    add r6, r1.xyxy, c19.zyzw
    mul r6, r6, c18.xyxy
    mul r7, r6.xyxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r7, r7, s2
    add r1.z, r0.w, r7.x
    mad_sat r7.x, r1.z, c17.z, -r3.x
    mul r6, r6.zwxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r6, r6, s2
    add r1.z, r0.w, r6.x
    mad_sat r7.y, r1.z, c17.z, -r3.x
    add r1.xy, r1, c19.z
    mul r1.xy, r1, c18
    mov r1.zw, c4.y
    texldl r1, r1, s2
    add r0.w, r0.w, r1.x
    mad_sat r7.z, r0.w, c17.z, -r3.x
    lrp r1, r2.x, r4.xyyz, r5.xyyz
    lrp r3.yz, r2.y, r1.xyww, r1.xxzw
    lrp r1, r2.x, r7.xyyz, r4.xyyz
    lrp r4.xy, r2.y, r1.ywzw, r1.xzzw
    add r0.w, r3.z, r3.y
    add r0.w, r4.x, r0.w
    add r0.w, r4.y, r0.w
    mul_sat_pp r0.w, r0.w, c5.x
    mul r1.xyz, r0.z, c8
    mad r1.xyz, c7, r0.y, r1
    mad r0.xyz, c9, r0.x, r1
    add r0.xyz, r0, c10
    add r0.xyz, -r0, c15
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c15.w
    dp3 r0.x, r0, r0
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c16.y, c16.z
    max r1.x, r0.x, c4.y
    mad r0.x, r1.x, -r1.x, -c6.x
    max r1.x, r0.x, c4.y
    pow_pp r0.x, r1.x, c16.x
    add r1, r3.x, c0
    mad r1, r0.x, r1, -c6.x
    mul r0.x, r0.w, r0.w
    add r2, -r1, -c6.x
    mad oC0, r0.x, r2, r1
